name: Center for Emerging and Innovative Sciences
overview:
“The Center for Emerging & Innovative Sciences (CEIS), established in 1993, is a NYSTAR-sponsored Center for Advanced Technology - one of 15 throughout New York State. CEIS promotes economic development in New York and the greater Rochester region through technological innovation with a focus on successful technology transfer.

Acting as a matchmaker, CEIS identifies areas where the interests of PIs intersect with industry corporate partners. Company needs are matched to faculty members with proven records of accomplishment. The desired outcome is company-sponsored university research projects with tangible technology deliverables. At times, CEIS may provide funding incentives for these projects. They invite faculty and business inquiries on a no-obligation basis.”
